sentence.Network_en: The President promised a government open to public scrutiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统承诺政府将接受公众监督。

sentence.Network_en: Their arguments do not withstand the most superficial scrutiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的论据经不起一点推敲。

sentence.Network_en: His private life came under media scrutiny.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的私生活受到媒体的密切关注。

一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... 263. safeguard v. 保护 266. scrutiny n. 细看 267. setback n. 挫折.
《疯狂英语2003合集全部文本》（一） ... ) devastated a. 毁坏的 ) scrutiny n. 详细审查 ) triumphant a. 胜利的，成功的.
六级阅读高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... scrutinize v. 细看（阅）；仔细检查 scrutiny n. 仔细检查，细看 secondary a. 次要的；中级的.

list.abs: 香港选举相关英语词汇(1) ... 公众集会；公众聚会 public meeting 公众监察 public scrutiny 公众申述 public representation.
1．嫌疑归类与严格审查（strict scrutiny）标准。20世纪50年代以后，“平等保护”的特点显现出显著的两重性：在保持以往宽松标准的 …
严格审查标准（Strict Scrutiny）： 适用于涉及「嫌疑分类」（如种族肤色（Race）、原族裔（National Origin）、某些情况下的外国 …
石油英语词汇(S2)--石油百科 ... scruple 迟疑；顾虑 scrutiny program 检查程序 scrutiny 精细研究.
Jackson Dr Jury... ... to deal with 处理，对付 media scrutiny 媒体监督 undoubtedly 毫无疑问地.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin scrutinium, from scrutari 'to search' (originally 'sort rubbish', from scruta 'rubbish'). Early use referred to the taking of individual votes in an election procedure

entry.tran: 详细的检查(或审查);仔细的观察
entry.def: If a person or thing is under scrutiny, they are being studied or observed very carefully.

example.ex: His private life came under media scrutiny...
example.tran: 他的私生活受到媒体的密切关注。

example.ex: The President promised a government open to public scrutiny.
example.tran: 总统承诺政府将接受公众监督。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of examining something closely (as for mistakes)

auth_sentence.content: It's not a feeling that bears much scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's not a feeling that bears much scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's not a feeling that bears much scrutiny.

auth_sentence.content: Tough regulatory scrutiny has only added to the gloom.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tough regulatory scrutiny has only added to the gloom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tough regulatory scrutiny has only added to the gloom.

auth_sentence.content: Their marital status did not shield them from scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their marital status did not shield them from scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their marital status did not shield them from scrutiny.

Sentence.sentence: It has been the subject of your close scrutiny every morning since you were tall enough to see into the bathroom mirror.

means.word_mean: 细看, 细查; 监视

sentences.en: He drew the conclusion after scrutinies.
sentences.cn: 经过详尽的调查他才得出这个结论。

jushi.english: A minister's actions come under minute scrutiny in the press.
jushi.chinese: 一个部长的各种行为都会受到报界仔细的审察。
